1011100.name: Jigsaw Masterpieces : Masterpieces of World - Renaissance -
1011100.description:
"Jigsaw Masterpieces : Masterpieces of World - Renaissance -" is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

PACK INFO:

Puzzle Count: 10 Puzzles

PACK CONTENTS:

  • Mona Lisa / Leonardo da Vinci
  • The Last Supper / Leonardo da Vinci
  • Madonna and Saint Anne / Leonardo da Vinci
  • Sistine Madonna / Raphael
  • The School of Athens / Raphael
  • The Birth of Venus / Sandro Botticelli
  • Primavera / Sandro Botticelli
  • Tower of Babel / Pieter Bruegel the Elder
  • The Peasant Dance / Pieter Bruegel the Elder
  • The Last Judgment / Michelangelo Buonarroti
